    • Uses of FloatInputPoll in ccre.chan

      Subinterfaces of FloatInputPoll in ccre.chan 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  FloatInput
      A FloatInput is a way to get the current state of a float input, and to subscribe to notifications of changes in the float input's value.
      Classes in ccre.chan that implement FloatInputPoll 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FloatStatus
      A virtual node that is both a FloatOutput and a FloatInput.

      Returns a scaled version of the specified input, such that when the value from the specified input is the value in the one parameter, the output is 1.0, and when the value from the specified input is the value in the zero parameter, the output is 0.0.
